name: Fluffy
alt: Loretta after getting into some spider webs
headline: What a rascal!
summary: Fluffy is a beautiful Savannah cat with golden fur. She loves to play with toys and enjoys lounging in sunny spots.

name: Duke
alt: Duke sitting off in the distance
headline: So well trained!
summary: Duke is a friendly and energetic Golden Retriever. He loves to play fetch and go for long walks. He gets along well with other dogs and people.

name: Charlie
headline: Voted best smile
summary: Charlie is a sweet and playful Labrador Retriever. He loves to run and play and is always up for a game of fetch. He is great with kids and other dogs.

name: Jasper
headline: The clean freak
summary: Jasper is a beautiful Berkshire Pig. He is very intelligent and loves to talk. He enjoys playing with toys and loves to perch on his owner's shoulder.

name: Louise
headline: Extra sassy girl
summary: Louise is a beautiful Orange tabby cat. She is very loyal and protective of her family. She enjoys going for walks and playing with her favorite ball.

name: Bella
headline: The extra dapper gal
summary: Bella is a beautiful Tuxedo cat with bright blue eyes. She is very affectionate and loves to cuddle. She enjoys chasing toys and playing hide and seek.

name: Tucker
headline: Will keep you on your toes!
summary: Tucker is a playful and energetic Grey Tabby. He loves to run and play and is always up for a game of tug-of-war. He is great with kids and loves to give kisses.

name: Wishbone
headline: Always ready for adventure!
summary: Wishbone is a beautiful Beagle with a gentle and loving personality. He enjoys going for walks and snuggling with his owners. He is great with kids and other dogs.
